it.unitn.disi.ds2.whanau.protocols

Class WhanauProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unitn.disi.ds2.whanau.protocols.WhanauProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, peersim.core.Protocol

    public class WhanauProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
implements peersim.core.Protocol
    Class which contains the tables and values specified by the Whanau protocol. It also provides some helper methods to access those values.

      • setUpInternalTables

        public void setUpInternalTables(int f,
                                int s,
                                int d,
                                int l,
                                int w)
        Set up the internal tables of the node.
        Parameters:
        f - Max numbers of fingers per layer we can have.
        s - Max numbers of successors per layer we can have.
        d - Max size of the db.
        l - Max number of layers.
        w - Mixing time of the graph.
